actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill entitled "The Government Executive Reduction Act".

summary.text: Limits the maximum number of civil service positions which may be classified in grades higher than GS-13 as of September 30, 1983. Directs the Office of Personnel Management to prescribe regulations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill entitled "The Government Executive Reduction Act".
